title: Joe Manchin Says His Spending, Climate Stance Should Be No Surprise
sub_head: West Virginia senator plays central role in Democrats’ debate over $3.5 trillion social-policy and climate package
body:
WASHINGTON—Sen. Joe Manchin’s cards were laid on the table Thursday. And the centrist Democrat from a solidly Republican, coal-producing state said no one should be surprised at what they showed.
“People pretty much know where I’ve been all along,” said the West Virginia lawmaker, whose state went for former President Donald Trump by 39 points in 2020. “I’ve never been a liberal in any way, shape or form. There’s no one that has ever thought I was.”
